abstract: In this investigation, students begin talking about the idea of energy. Students start by defining energy and investigating differences between potential and kinetic energy. They then explore energy transfer and energy conservation. Finally, they connect energy to charges and atomic structure of matter. This investigation builds toward NGSS PEs: MS-PS3-5, MS-PS1-4, and HS-PS3-2.
credits: The Concord Consortium and CREATE for STEM at MSU
description: Students define potential and kinetic energy, explore energy transfer and energy conservation, and connect energy to atomic structure.
name: Unit 2 - Inv. 1: What is happening when a spark occurs? (v2)
